alert.note: Alert for Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:44PM CDT until July 13 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM CDT FOR NESHOBA COUNTY... At 344 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pearl River, or near Edinburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Philadelphia around 355 PM CDT. Dowdville around 400 PM CDT. Dixon around 415 PM CDT. Neshoba and Bethsaida around 430 PM CDT. House around 445 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Tucker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
